title: Can't open project cache boxes
body: I've been trying to open them it says error

replies.body:
The PROJECT: Disruption caches and crafting content was disabled with the content disable we did after the World's loot expired (Nov. 6th). Unfortunately, this content is no longer usable, so if you'd like it removed from your inventory you can reach our specialists in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to do so.

Let me know if you have any questions.

They never said it would get removed at all. I would certainly have used them before it expired I paid for them I want to use them. Thery said it would disappear the project cores and the disruption icon crafting. I double checked everywhere and they never said anything about PROJECT: DISRUPTION caches.

It was announced on our [**Worlds 2016 Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift), just under the Icon crafting breakdown:

> *"Crafting materials will expire at 23:59 PST on November 6 along with the team emotes, recalls, and leftover PROJECT crafting materials as well."*

I'm sorry you missed the announcement for this. While we cannot provide any sort of compensation, please let me know if you have any questions.

I would appreciate if you don't use a condescending tone with me. I did indeed read that announcement.

>"leftover PROJECT crafting materials as well."

Project Cache boxes "Augment Cache" aren't crafting materials, you don't use them to craft anything. I got warnings for my crafting materials about the expiration date. I didn't get any for the augmentation caches.

You guys didn't announce anywhere about the removal or inability to use the caches, just the "crafting materials" as you said it.
